item.title: Making custom badges using shields.io
item.description: When I wanted to customize my GitHub profile, I visited many developers’ GitHub profiles and used to see some badges which seems cool to me. When I looked at the code behind the profiles, I didn’t have the slightest idea what was going on. Later, I tried to copy some of the code and paste them into my code, but it couldn’t solve the need. Well, after some reading and searching, I was able to understand how to make them.
